scripts.frontend: cd frontend && npm i && ng serve --open
scripts.auth: cd services/auth-service && npm i && nodemon index.js
scripts.pers: cd services/personalization-service && npm i && nodemon index.js
scripts.weather-data: cd services/data-service && npm i && nodemon index.js
scripts.database: cd services/database-service && npm i && nodemon src/index.ts
scripts.server: node_modules/.bin/npm-run-all --parallel auth pers weather-data backend database
